t: New toolmaker (new to me) | American Association of Woodturners
s: I have several of Hurricane's HSS turning tools and they seem to keep their edge about the same as my Sorby tools. ... I have a large SRG, skew and detail gouge. No issues with the business end at all. I usually replace handles anyway so it isn't a factor for me. I bought them on Amazon.
